metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9474 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the mpfr_strtofr function in GNU MPFR before 3.1.2-p11 allows context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to incorrect documentation for mpn_set_str.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpfr6 - 3.1.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpfr4 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-2').
